name: Santa Claws (itch)
description:
This is my submission for the 2021 Secret Santa Game Jame on itch.io Unfortunately due to mental health, I was unable to complete it, but I would definitely love to go back to it at some point to work it out.

You only have one button to press! Press and hold space to move, each time you press, you change direction, even in the air. This allows you to navigate the world, bouncing and falling your way to the end.
